message.content:
Review the splice-cep CSXS/manifest.xml file to ensure it supports all Premiere Pro versions properly.

Check:
1. CEP version compatibility (should support CEP 11-14 for PP 2022-2025)
2. Host application version ranges
3. Extension bundle version
4. Required runtime settings

Update the manifest to ensure maximum compatibility across Premiere Pro versions 2022, 2023, 2024, and 2025.

file.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ExtensionManifest xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
                   ExtensionBundleId="com.splice.panel"
                   ExtensionBundleVersion="6.0.7"
                   Version="12.0">

    <ExtensionList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main" Version="6.0.7"/>
    </ExtensionList>

    <ExecutionEnvironment>
        <HostList>
            <Host Name="PPRO" Version="[23.0,99.9]"/>
        </HostList>
        <LocaleList>
            <Locale Code="All"/>
        </LocaleList>
        <RequiredRuntimeList>
            <RequiredRuntime Name="CSXS" Version="10.0"/>
        </RequiredRuntimeList>
    </ExecutionEnvironment>

    <DispatchInfoList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main">
            <DispatchInfo>
                <Resources>
                    <MainPath>./panel/index.html</MainPath>
                    <ScriptPath>./jsx/hostScript.jsx</ScriptPath>
                    <CEFCommandLine>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access-from-files</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--enable-nodejs</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--mixed-context</Parameter>
                    </CEFCommandLine>
                </Resources>
                <AccessList>
                    <URLAccess>
                        <URL>https://splice-api-production.up.railway.app</URL>
                        <URL>https://spliceclips.com</URL>
                        <URL>https://splice.video</URL>
                    </URLAccess>
                </AccessList>
                <Lifecycle>
                    <AutoVisible>true</AutoVisible>
                </Lifecycle>
                <UI>
                    <Type>Panel</Type>
                    <Menu>SPLICE - AI Video Editor</Menu>
                    <Geometry>
                        <Size>
                            <Height>800</Height>
                            <Width>400</Width>
                        </Size>
                        <MinSize>
                            <Height>400</Height>
                            <Width>300</Width>
                        </MinSize>
                        <MaxSize>
                            <Height>2000</Height>
                            <Width>800</Width>
                        </MaxSize>
                    </Geometry>
                    <Icons>
                        <Icon Type="Normal">./panel/icons/icon-light.png</Icon>
                        <Icon Type="DarkNormal">./panel/icons/icon-dark.png</Icon>
                    </Icons>
                </UI>
            </DispatchInfo>
        </Extension>
    </DispatchInfoList>
</ExtensionManifest>

content.text:
I found issues with the manifest. Let me update it for proper Premiere Pro 2022-2025 compatibility.

**Issues identified:**
1. **CEP Version**: Uses `Version="12.0"` (CEP 12) but `RequiredRuntime` is CEP 10.0 - inconsistent
2. **Host Version**: `[23.0,99.9]` only covers PP 2023+, missing PP 2022 (v22.x)
3. **Bundle Version**: Still at 6.0.7, should match current release 6.0.8

**Premiere Pro CEP Version Mapping:**
- PP 2022 (v22.x): CEP 10, 11
- PP 2023 (v23.x): CEP 11
- PP 2024 (v24.x): CEP 11
- PP 2025 (v25.x): CEP 11 (potentially CEP 12)

input.old_string:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ExtensionManifest xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
                   ExtensionBundleId="com.splice.panel"
                   ExtensionBundleVersion="6.0.7"
                   Version="12.0">

    <ExtensionList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main" Version="6.0.7"/>
    </ExtensionList>

    <ExecutionEnvironment>
        <HostList>
            <Host Name="PPRO" Version="[23.0,99.9]"/>
        </HostList>
        <LocaleList>
            <Locale Code="All"/>
        </LocaleList>
        <RequiredRuntimeList>
            <RequiredRuntime Name="CSXS" Version="10.0"/>
        </RequiredRuntimeList>
    </ExecutionEnvironment>
input.new_string:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ExtensionManifest xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
                   ExtensionBundleId="com.splice.panel"
                   ExtensionBundleVersion="6.0.8"
                   Version="11.0">

    <ExtensionList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main" Version="6.0.8"/>
    </ExtensionList>

    <ExecutionEnvironment>
        <HostList>
            <!-- PP 2022 (v22.x), PP 2023 (v23.x), PP 2024 (v24.x), PP 2025 (v25.x) -->
            <Host Name="PPRO" Version="[22.0,99.9]"/>
        </HostList>
        <LocaleList>
            <Locale Code="All"/>
        </LocaleList>
        <RequiredRuntimeList>
            <!-- CEP 11 supports PP 2022-2025 -->
            <RequiredRuntime Name="CSXS" Version="11.0"/>
        </RequiredRuntimeList>
    </ExecutionEnvironment>

toolUseResult.originalFile:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ExtensionManifest xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
                   ExtensionBundleId="com.splice.panel"
                   ExtensionBundleVersion="6.0.7"
                   Version="12.0">

    <ExtensionList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main" Version="6.0.7"/>
    </ExtensionList>

    <ExecutionEnvironment>
        <HostList>
            <Host Name="PPRO" Version="[23.0,99.9]"/>
        </HostList>
        <LocaleList>
            <Locale Code="All"/>
        </LocaleList>
        <RequiredRuntimeList>
            <RequiredRuntime Name="CSXS" Version="10.0"/>
        </RequiredRuntimeList>
    </ExecutionEnvironment>

    <DispatchInfoList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main">
            <DispatchInfo>
                <Resources>
                    <MainPath>./panel/index.html</MainPath>
                    <ScriptPath>./jsx/hostScript.jsx</ScriptPath>
                    <CEFCommandLine>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access-from-files</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--enable-nodejs</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--mixed-context</Parameter>
                    </CEFCommandLine>
                </Resources>
                <AccessList>
                    <URLAccess>
                        <URL>https://splice-api-production.up.railway.app</URL>
                        <URL>https://spliceclips.com</URL>
                        <URL>https://splice.video</URL>
                    </URLAccess>
                </AccessList>
                <Lifecycle>
                    <AutoVisible>true</AutoVisible>
                </Lifecycle>
                <UI>
                    <Type>Panel</Type>
                    <Menu>SPLICE - AI Video Editor</Menu>
                    <Geometry>
                        <Size>
                            <Height>800</Height>
                            <Width>400</Width>
                        </Size>
                        <MinSize>
                            <Height>400</Height>
                            <Width>300</Width>
                        </MinSize>
                        <MaxSize>
                            <Height>2000</Height>
                            <Width>800</Width>
                        </MaxSize>
                    </Geometry>
                    <Icons>
                        <Icon Type="Normal">./panel/icons/icon-light.png</Icon>
                        <Icon Type="DarkNormal">./panel/icons/icon-dark.png</Icon>
                    </Icons>
                </UI>
            </DispatchInfo>
        </Extension>
    </DispatchInfoList>
</ExtensionManifest>

content.text:
Updated `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-cep/CSXS/manifest.xml` with the following changes:

**Changes Made:**

| Setting | Before | After | Reason |
|---------|--------|-------|--------|
| `ExtensionBundleVersion` | 6.0.7 | 6.0.8 | Match current release |
| `Version` (CEP manifest) | 12.0 | 11.0 | CEP 11 is stable across PP 2022-2025 |
| `Extension Version` | 6.0.7 | 6.0.8 | Match current release |
| `Host Version` | [23.0,99.9] | [22.0,99.9] | Include PP 2022 (v22.x) |
| `RequiredRuntime CSXS` | 10.0 | 11.0 | CEP 11 consistent with manifest version |

**Premiere Pro Version Coverage:**

| Premiere Pro | Internal Version | CEP Support | Status |
|--------------|------------------|-------------|--------|
| PP 2022 | 22.x | CEP 10-11 | Now supported |
| PP 2023 | 23.x | CEP 11 | Supported |
| PP 2024 | 24.x | CEP 11 | Supported |
| PP 2025 | 25.x | CEP 11 | Supported |
